name: Conundrum (James Stack)
description:
A short game I made for the Hyper Casual game jam hosted by MrChickenBoy & co. I didn't have much time to work on this one because of school, but I hope you enjoy regardless. I pretty much made this entirely on the first day lol.

Theme:

Conundrum

Restriction:

Three Colors (White, Black, and Pink)

The font I used is called Vermin Vibes 1989.
